This project is a full-stack web app for real-time gas and diesel price tracking and automated buying for truckers and truck stop owners. Use React for the frontend dashboard, Node.js/Express for the backend, and MongoDB for the database. Integrate with EIA API for fuel prices. Include user authentication, price alerts, and logic for automated order placement when price hits userâ€™s target. Add Stripe payment integration for transactions.
